org.apache.solr.analytics.util

Class AnalyticsParsers

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.solr.analytics.util.AnalyticsParsers

  • public class AnalyticsParsers
extends Object
    Class to hold the parsers used for Solr Analytics.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  AnalyticsParsers.NumericParser
      Converts the long returned by NumericDocValues into the correct number and return it as a string.
      static interface  AnalyticsParsers.Parser
      For use in classes that grab values by docValue.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static AnalyticsParsers.NumericParser DATE_DOC_VALUES_PARSER
      Converts the BytesRef or long to the correct date string.
      static AnalyticsParsers.NumericParser DOUBLE_DOC_VALUES_PARSER
      Converts the BytesRef or long to the correct double string.
      static AnalyticsParsers.NumericParser FLOAT_DOC_VALUES_PARSER
      Converts the BytesRef or long to the correct float string.
      static AnalyticsParsers.NumericParser INT_DOC_VALUES_PARSER
      Converts the BytesRef or long to the correct int string.
      static AnalyticsParsers.NumericParser LONG_DOC_VALUES_PARSER
      Converts the BytesRef or long to the correct long string.
      static AnalyticsParsers.Parser STRING_PARSER
      Converts the BytesRef to the correct string.

      static AnalyticsParsers.Parser getParser(Class<? extends FieldType> class1)
